attributes.additional_details:
This petition asks wether the Secreatary of State for Culture Media and Sport agrees that this was the greatest olympic games ever?

If he believes it was, it is clearly a veiw not shared by the Jacques Rogge who refused to say as much at the closing ceremony.

Like the Secretary of State, Mr Rogge has never proven himself in the field of athletics.

Given their shared influence and obvious disagreement over which has been the greatest games, this petition asks that they serve three rounds in acordance with olympic rules of boxing in order to agree which has been the greatest games ever.
